title: Puy lentil, rocket and feta salad
ingredients: ['100g Puy lentils', '1 red chilli', '2 whole garlic cloves', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon finely chopped shallot', '2 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped parsley', '1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar', '4 handfuls rocket leaves', '4 tablespoons semi-sun-dried tomatoes (optional)', '150g feta cheese, crumbled', '1/2 teaspoon thyme leaves']
